isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - TIMING GEAR TRAIN AND FRONT COVER - TIMING GEAR TRAIN - INSTALLATION

step1.para: Install the crankcase front plate as follows:

step2.para: Install a new front plate gasket over the crankcase alignment dowels. Use grease to hold the gasket in place.

Mount front plate to crankcase using four lock bolts. Tighten bolts to specified torque. Refer to Figure 8.17
.

note.para: If required, trim the excess material at the bottom of the gasket .

step1.para: Install a new crankshaft gear and oil spline gear, if required, as specified in VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE.

Reinstall the crankshaft. Refer to VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE
for installation instructions.
If required, press on a new camshaft gear as explained in "ROCKER ARM ASSEMBLY, CAMSHAFT, TAPPETS AND PUSH RODS".
Install the camshaft and gear assembly as specified in "ROCKER ARM ASSEMBLY, CAMSHAFT, TAPPETS AND PUSH RODS".

note.para: Check camshaft end play and be sure the tappets move freely in their bores.

figure.caption: Figure 8.17. Front Plate and Front Plate Gasket Installation to Crankcase.

step1.para:
Install the idler gear as follows: ( Figure 8.18
).

step2.para: Assemble the bearing assembly, shaft, retainer bolt and spacer washer in the gear.

note.para: Use grease to hold the spacer washer in place.

step2.para: Install the gear with the timing marks facing out.
Tighten the retaining bolt to the specified SPECIAL TORQUE.

note.para: IDLER GEAR COMPONENTS MUST BE ASSEMBLED AS SHOWN IN FIGURE 8.18 OR GEAR BACKLASH WILL BE UNACCEPTABLE.

step1.para:
When an engine has been disassembled and the camshaft, crankshaft or idler gear removed, the gears must be assembled with the timing marks properly aligned ( Figure 8.19
).

note.para: The single punch marks on the crankshaft and idler gears must align, while the two punch marks on the camshaft and idler gears must align.
Once assembled at "marks aligned" position, engine will require 12 crankshaft revolutions for "marks aligned" position again.
REMEASURE CAMSHAFT TO IDLER GEAR AND CRANKSHAFT TO IDLER GEAR BACKLASH, AFTER INSTALLATION TO CONFIRM PROPER REASSEMBLY.
